attributes.action: Give authority to police to request support from local army units directly in an emergency
attributes.additional_details:
Please delegate to Chief Constables the authority to request support from local Army units in times of riots or civil unrest.

Please Strengthen links betwwen Army, RAF and Royal Navy establishments  ( including  TA)  and permit and authorise local commanders  to deploy their forces  "In support  of the Civil Power"  at short notice,  without recourse to authorisation from MOD.
